companies.name: Pixar RenderMan
companies.description: Pixar RenderMan is an Academy Award-winning rendering software developed by Pixar Animation Studios, used for creating photorealistic and stylized imagery in feature films, visual effects, and animation. Renowned for its physically-based rendering, advanced shading, and plugin support for major 3D applications, RenderMan is a production-proven tool trusted by leading studios worldwide.
